phrs.translation: 无数地, 不可胜数地

sentences.sentence: That promises to improve the lot of humanity as a whole incalculably.
sentences.translation: 这在整体上极大的提高了全人类的生活水平。

sentences.sentence: This invention played an incalculably important role in the spread of culture.
sentences.translation: 造纸术的发明，对人类文化的传播起到不可估量的作用。

sentences.sentence: But the effect of her being on those around her was incalculably diffusive: for the growing good of the world is partly dependent on unhistoric acts;
sentences.translation: 然而她的存在对于她周围的人有无可估量的扩散效应：这个世界的不断增长的善部分地依赖于划时代的行动；
